subject: Basketball
Women
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Dejuan Goodwin made a winning jump shot from the top of the key with one second left to give Marist a 51-50 victory against visiting Iona on Friday.
snippet: Dejuan Goodwin made a winning jump shot from the top of the key with one second left to give Marist a 51-50 victory against visiting Iona on Friday.
